About Me

I have a strong foundation in Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. What started as a quest for a rewarding and intellectually stimulating career quickly evolved into a passion for solving complex problems and creating efficient, user-friendly solutions.

While I am adept at creating websites from scratch, I'm also comfortable utilizing tools like Photoshop to enhance the user experience and create visually appealing interfaces. Moreover, I've been harnessing the power of AI to increase my efficiency and effectiveness in programming—a testament to my adaptability and eagerness to stay at the forefront of tech trends.

Over the past several years, I've also honed my skills through numerous programming challenges on platforms like HackerRank and Google Foobar. This has significantly bolstered my problem-solving abilities and critical thinking skills, enabling me to confidently tackle any project.
